description: Labs Widget Pack - Multi line timeseries comparison

configuration.name: enableFilters
configuration.title: Enable dashboard filters
configuration.description: Allows the use of dashboard filters

configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

configuration.name: comparePeriod
configuration.title: Compare period eg. X days, hours, weeks, months, quarter (numeric)

configuration.name: customSinceClause
configuration.title: Custom since clause eg. SINCE 12 hours ago (refresh)
